message.body: Are you gonna get a chance to see tree of life? Also. I think we're having a party at our house tomorrow night. House warming or something?
Yea once im up there I'll do my damndest. Party huh? That could be funnnn
Ok. Let me know. Cause I'd go again. And scotty and jeanne need to see it.
Oh cool, yea. Im moving up for good on Sunday but don't start until next week so I'll have plenty of time. maybe it would make more sense I'd you guys tell me when you can cone up?
Still struggling with the iphone keyboard? But ya that makes sense.
Pfh just 'cone'... Give a bitch a break. I have sausage fingers. Look at tylers for reference
Also I'd instead of if. I think. Read anything good?
Blah not really I read articles more than things I should read like books
I've been reading f scott fitzgerald short stories. Makes me want nyc. And yale. Or nyc and yale in 1910.
When does the party start offich? Half word
Scotty gets off work at 9:30. So around then I guess. Not sure if there is an official start. Not sure if there is an offich start either.
Its alright. The person who greeted me was really bitchy and made me cry. But now I'm eating dinner with meg.
Oh yikes. Who was the person?
A friend of my roommate who I still haven't met
Right. I remember that now. First time seeing megan back?
Yes :) drunk on wine. I had such a good time last night
I had a nice night too. Despite the blueberries and broken lion and tyler sicky and other stuff. Glad you came. Have fun with megan.
Thanks. I like you a lot sam. thanks for having me. And putting up with Tyler
